name: MEC Fusion Shorty Wetsuit - Women's
description:
Get one-piece coverage for paddling in warmer water and weather. This shorty wetsuit keeps your critical torso insulated without gaps where cold can get in. And there's no bulky overlap at the waist. The Fusion series benefits from years of materials development to produce neoprene that’s more comfortable, mobile and warm when you're in the water.2mm superstretch neoprene provides maximum comfort, fit, and mobility.Sophisticated patterning is comfortable through activity.

Body fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering
